results.title: Taj Mahal - Wikipedia
results.description: The Taj Mahal was designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1983 for being "the jewel of Islamic art in India and one of the universally admired masterpieces of the world's heritage". It is regarded as one of the best examples of Mughal architecture and a symbol of Indian history.

results.title: Taj Mahal (musician) - Wikipedia
results.description: Henry St. Claire Fredericks Jr. (born May 17, 1942), better known by his stage name Taj Mahal, is an American blues musician. results.title: Taj Mahal Gets Anti-Drone Security Upgrade To Protect It
results.description: The Taj Mahal gets a tech upgrade with a new anti-drone system, enhancing security and preserving the serenity of India's iconic monument.

results.description: LUCKNOW: In the wake of the Indo-Pak military face-off following Operation Sindoor, security agencies recognising the potential threat to national monuments have installed anti-drone technology at the Taj Mahal in Agra to safeguard the UNESCO World Heritage Site against possible aerial attacks ...

results.title: Taj Mahal, New Delhi welcomes Kaushik Misra as executive chef - ET HospitalityWorld
results.description: Taj Mahal, New Delhi welcomes Kaushik Misra as its new executive chef, bringing over two decades of global culinary expertise and innovative dining concepts to the hotel.

results.title: Anti-Drone system deployed to strengthen security at Taj Mahal
results.description: Assistant Commissioner of Police (Taj Security) Syed Arib Ahmed explained that the system is placed within the Taj Mahal premises and is designed to disable unauthorized drones entering the restricted airspace.

results.title: Anti-Drone System Deployed At Taj Mahal To Boost Security
results.description: An anti-drone system now protects the Taj Mahal, jamming unauthorized drones within 500 meters. A rapid response team secures neutralized drones and tracks operators, boosting monument security.
